name: Cave Disco
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Cambridge Game Jam 2023. It was programmed in C (win32+OpenGL).

This is a highly polished experience about dancing in a cave, alone and with no exit. Music not provided, please bring your own.

It strongly ties in with this year's theme ("Beneath the Earth") as this particular cave is deep below the surface.

With no goals, enemies or objectives, the only limit in this game is your imagination.

Controls:

Arrow keys - move

ESC - quit
